actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that coffee containers available for retail distribution should be labeled to specify the percentage of coffee which has been purchased from Uganda.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of Congress that coffee containers used for the retail distribution of coffee should be labeled with the percentage of coffee contained which was purchased from Uganda.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that coffee containers available for retail distribution should be labeled to specify the percentage of coffee which has been purchased from Uganda.
